title: Model Context Protocol: A Primer for the Developers
author: Janakiram MSV
description: This series introduces Python developers to the fundamentals of MCP and its architecture, along with a hands-on implementation for servers and clients.
cntitle: 模型上下文协议：开发者入门
cndescription: 本系列向 Python 开发人员介绍 MCP 的基础知识及其架构，以及服务器和客户端的实践实现。
